At the start of the game all **152** tiles are in the center of the table face down. Each player builds their own wall of tiles in front of their position. The wall consists of:

-   **19 tiles across** - placed end to end in a line\
-   **2 tiles high** - each stack is two tiles tall\
-   **38 tiles total** per wall (19 Ã— 2)

All tiles are placed **face down** so no one can see what they are.
